ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: pre-treatment assessment or post-assessment
If all mood symptoms are accounted for by a diagnosis of schizoaffective disorder or if there have never been any clinically significant mood symptoms, check here
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; met for at least one manic episode
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; occurrence of the manic and major depressive episode(s) is not better explained by Schizoaffective Disorder, Schizophrenia, Schizophreniform Disorder, Delusional Disorder, or Other Specified or Unspecified Schizophrenia Spectrum and Other Psychotic Disorder.
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; type of current (or most recent) episode
Notes: 1 = manic; 2 = hypomanic; 3 = major depressive; 4 = unspecified; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: criteria have been met for at least one hypomanic episode and at least one major depressive episode
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; has never been a manic episode
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; occurrence of the hypomanic episode(s) and major depressive episode(s) is not better explained by Schizoaffective Disorder, Schizophrenia, Schizophreniform Disorder, Delusional Disorder, or Other Specified or Unspecified Schizophrenia Spectrum and Other Psychotic Disorder.
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; symptoms of depression or the unpredictability caused by frequent alternation between periods of depression and hypomania causes clinically significant distress or impairment in social, occupational, or other important areas of functioning
Notes: 1= Absent or False; 2= Subthreshold; 3= Threshold or True; 4= Mild; 5= Moderate; 6= Severe; -7= N/A; -9= Missing or Not Reported

ElementDescription: Criteria A, B, C, & D coded 3
Notes: 1= absent or false; 2 = subthreshold; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported; -1 = Inadequate Information/Unknown

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; type of current (or most recent) episode (not manic)
Notes: 1 = hypomanic ; 2 = major depressive; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; presence of at least four mood episodes in the previous 12 months that meet the criteria for a manic, hypomanic, or major depressive episode
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; at least two major depressive episodes in the past two years
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; at least two manic or hypomanic episodes in the past two years
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; above criteria are coded "1"
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; a regular temporal relationship between the onset of manic, hypomanic, or major depressive episodes and a particular time of the year
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; indicate month of regular onset of episode
Bipolar Disorder; full remissions (or a change from major depression to mania or hypomania or vice versa) also occur at a characteristic time of the year
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; in the last 2 years, the individual's manic, hypomanic, or major depressive episodes have demonstrated a temporal seasonal relationship, as defined above
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; seasonal manias, hypomanias, or depressions (as described above) substantially outnumber any nonseasonal manias, hypomanias, or depressions that may have occurred over the individual's lifetime
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; symptoms characteristic of a bipolar and related disorder "predominate" but do not meet the full criteria for bipolar I, bipolar II, or cyclothymic disorder
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; symptoms that cause clinically significant distress or impairment
Notes: 1= Absent or False; 2= Subthreshold; 3= Threshold or True; 4= Mild; 5= Moderate; 6= Severe; -7= N/A; -9= Missing or Not Reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; primary other specified bipolar disorder: not attributable to the physiological effects of a substance/medication or to another medical condition
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: type of Bipolar disorder
Notes: 1 = short-duration hypomanic and major depressive episodes ; 2 = hypomanic -like episodes with insufficient symptoms and major depressive episodes; 3 = hypomanic episodes without prior major depressive episode; 4 = short-duration cyclothymia; 5 = short-duration manic-like episodes; 6 = unable to determine bipolar or related disorder; 7 = other; 8 = unspecified; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; present in last month
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; met symptomatic criteria for a manic, hypomanic, or major depressive episode in the past month
Notes: 1= absent or false; 2 = subthreshold; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported; -1 = Inadequate Information/Unknown

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; number of months prior to interview when the subject last had persistently depressed, or euphoric or irritable mood.
Bipolar Disorder; indicate type of remission
Notes: 1 = in partial remission; 2 = in full remission; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; age at onset of first manic, hypomanic, or major depressive episode
Notes: Code 99 if unknown

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; if most recent episode is manic: indicate current severity
Notes: 1 = mild; 2 = moderate; 3 = severe; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; if most recent episode is manic: with psychotic features

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; if most recent episode is manic: with psychotic features, specify
Notes: 1 = mood-congruent psychotic features ; 2 = mood-incongruent psychotic features; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Age at onset of 1st Manic, Mixed, Hypomanic, or Major Depressive Episode

Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; most recent episode is depressed: current severity
Notes: 1 = mild; 2 = moderate; 3 = severe; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; most recent episode is depressed: with psychotic features
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; most recent episode is depressed: with psychotic features, specify
Notes: 1 = mood-congruent psychotic features ; 2 = mood-incongruent psychotic features; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: Bipolar Disorder; most recent episode is depressed: with panic attacks
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: BP, most recent episode is hypomanic or "unspecified": age at onset of first manic, mixed, hypomanic, or major depressive episode
BP, most recent episode is hypomanic or "unspecified":  check if, with panic attacks
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported
